CityMania::CityMania

CityMania::CityMania Class Reference

Sample showing how to manage different game states, with transitions between menu screens, a loading screen, the game itself, and a pause menu. This main game class is extremely simple: all the interesting stuff happens in the ScreenManager component. More...

Detailed Description

Sample showing how to manage different game states, with transitions between menu screens, a loading screen, the game itself, and a pause menu. This main game class is extremely simple: all the interesting stuff happens in the ScreenManager component.
